parameters.name: DefenseScene
parameters.description:
The type of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) protection policy. Valid values:

*   waf_group: basic web protection
*   custom_acl: custom protection
*   whitelist: IP address whitelist
*   ip_blacklist: IP address blacklist
*   region_block: region blacklist
*   bot: bot management

parameters.name: DomainNameLike
parameters.description: The protected domain name. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page. Valid values: **1** to **100000**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of domain names to return on each page. Valid values: an integer from **1** to **500**. Default value: **20**.
